name: Rarity Chase
description:
Rarity Chase is an adventure for board game fans. Quickly learn simple rules, roll the die and go in search of an ancient artifact. Find and wisely use resources and bonuses.

You can choose one of four characters, each with his own skill. Play alone against AI, with friends on the same computer or through Steam Remote Play, as well as online with other players.

Original low poly graphics. Several maps of different sizes and content. High replayability due to the random arrangement of tokens on the playing field and the unique abilities of the characters.

Rarity Chase - entertainment for the whole family. Deliver the artifact to its destination and win the race!

Game Features

  • Different game modes.
  • Multiple maps.
  • Four characters with unique abilities.
  • Ability for all players to choose the same character.
  • Replayability.
  • Local multiplayer on the same computer or Remote Play via Steam.
  • A game for the whole family.
  • Leaderboards.
  • Achievements.
